TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CharacterHit extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit>
Public Structure CharacterHit Implements IEquatable(Of CharacterHit)

Docs.summary: Represents information about a character hit within a glyph run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit> structure provides information about the index of the first character that got hit as well as information about leading or trailing edge.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: Index of the first character that got hit.
In the case of a leading edge, this value is 0. In the case of a trailing edge, this value is the number of code points until the next valid caret position.
